action_node.add_to_case_if_possible.empt: Select missing information to complete the configuration.
action_node.add_to_case_if_possible.cont: Add to an open matching case in the inbox <Inbox>{{inbox}}</Inbox>. If no matching case is found, a new case will be created.
detail_pannel.no_selected_nodes.title: Workflow detail
detail_pannel.no_selected_nodes.descript: Select a node to see its details.
detail_pannel.multiple_selected_nodes.de: You have selected multiple nodes. This panel doesn't show details of multiple nodes. Please select only one node to see details.
detail_pannel.create_trigger_node.title: Choose a trigger
detail_pannel.create_trigger_node.descri: A trigger is an event that starts the workflow. Choose a trigger to start the workflow.
detail_pannel.create_action_node.title: Choose an action
detail_pannel.create_action_node.descrip: An action is a task that the workflow performs. Choose an action to add to the workflow.
detail_pannel.decision_created.descripti: Triggered when a decision is created, that matches the following criteria.
